website_summaries.verdict: This product has been around a long time. It is one your grandparents might remember.
pros: Provides a root beer taste which is appealing for kids who don't like other flavors
cons: The distinctive root beer flavor is one that is not for everyone, and it contains some artificial ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Fletcher's still around Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a laxative for my grandson, I grew up taking Syrup of Black Draught, it's no longer around, but I knew the name Fletcher's Castoria, it's now just Fletcher's, (my friends childhood laxative). Imagine my surprise when I walked into CVS and Walgreens, there was nothing I was familiar with. I needed something for my grand baby ,I was familiar with. I found Fletcher's is still around an online it's easy on his little tum tum an it's root beer flavored.
customer_reviews.author: Mz.W

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Essential part of treatment for my toddler with withholding issues. Great rootbeer taste and very effective
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product that I searched both high and low
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product that I searched both high and low. I was so glad I found it on amazon and I remember this when I was a little girl. Fletcher's is a great company and has been around for years. It works great for children and even adults. Has a great root beer flavor. The kids love it. My little grand daughter takes it and it has helped her .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: we've searched all over for product that works. My toddler had huge problems and this is working like a mirracle. it also tastes good so she loves taking it. SO happy to have found it
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my son who has chronic constipation. He began to refuse the chocolate exlax square and this was a great substitution. It does taste like root beer, however it does have an after taste that r minds me of Pepto Bismal. We give him 2 teaspoons in a 6oz glass of actual rootbeer and he has no idea. Completely undetectable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty fast too
customer_reviews.text: I remember taking this as a child and didn't know if they still made it.My husband had surgery recently and is on a lot of pain meds.I wanted something natural so that it was not so harsh.This really did the trick!Works pretty fast too.This is not only great for kids but for seniors also.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ann Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Son has had problems with going to the bathroom. (has had a problem since 6months old, he is now 2. I gave him lactulose in the AM, and Fletcher's at night, he is going everyday!!

customer_reviews.title: It works

We give him a teaspoon every morning. Oh - and my son loves the root beer flavor.

customer_reviews.title: Review on Fletcher's children's laxative
customer_reviews.text: I have known of this product since my childhood days. It is a very mild product and helps children when they need just a little help with their movements. Now my grandchildren use it on occasion. I was purchasing it at my local grocery store's pharmacy until a few months back. At this time I can't find it at either grocery or a regular pharmacy. Thank you, Amazon for having this product.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: easy going
customer_reviews.text: This is great for any age. I am using this for my mom who is under hospice care. The product that they were using was very harsh on her. I had remembered about this product from when my children were younger and could only find it online. This is better tasting and works great.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT product for Little Ones, VERY GENTLE, sad can't find in stores anymore gotta get it online, been using for 16 yrs!

My younger two use it and I have recommended it to everyone I know who has kids, but unfortunately I have run into the problem of finding in any of my local pharmacies or grocery stores.

customer_reviews.title: Fletcher's Root Beer Laxative
customer_reviews.text: Fletcher's is very soothing for your child's stomach and provides fast relief. It is recommended to have a juice behind taking Fletcher's because it has the tendency to leave the root beer after taste in your child's mouth. Juice will get rid of the root beer after taste, not plain water.

customer_reviews.title: tastes good, and works

customer_reviews.title: Super Days!

customer_reviews.text: Batch must have been left out inthe sun. The sugar crystallized. The product doesn't taste like it usually does. I am i lifelong user.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miralax a No. Fletcher a Go!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A friend recommended this product to me and had to try it. Smells and tastes like root beer. My 2yr old daughter has struggled using the potty since she was born. The drs recommended using a cap full of miralax everyday but read the harmful side effects. And wanted something better for her. The taste is a plus she loves the taste. I would recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tisurfergirl13

customer_reviews.title: Not much movement
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is natural, and I bought it for my toddler who hates having bowel movements. He will literally hold it until he has an accident. I was suggested this product. It seemed to do nothing for him. (I am not sure if my son fought harder to hold it, or if it didn't do much.) I also took a dose so I would know what it would do to my son, but it didn't seem to do much for me either.
customer_reviews.author: A. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was born with chronic constipation. She has been on 1/2 cap of miralax daily for the past 2 yrs. I've tried every homeopathic treatment there is. We've seen multiple GI specialists. It has been a nightmare. Long story short this stuff works!!! I wish it didn't take us so long to discover it. It's amazing and tastes like rootbeer. Keeps everything soft and flowing. Good luck parents. I know it's tough. Give this a go.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Its effective and gentle and tastes good so kids take it easily
customer_reviews.text: My mother gave us this gentle laxative when we were kids so I know first hand how well it works. Its effective and gentle and tastes good so kids take it easily. It's now hard to find so I buy several bottles at a time from Amazon. This company has it at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel Lady

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GREAT. I’ve been using it for years

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this product
customer_reviews.text: It works! Maybe a little too well. My toddler has been having a really hard time with going number two on the potty. She holds it in, and then becomes constipated. Then because it hurts to go, she's scared to go, and becomes even more constipated. It's a vicious cycle, however this stuff really helps! It softens the stools enough to make it difficult for her to hold it, and easier to go. Glad I found this product, because it's hard to watch your littles suffer.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter has chronic constipation issues, milk allergies, acid reflux, and a wide variety of gastro-intestinal issues. There is nothing worse than seeing your sweet little one suffer and not be able to get things moving. We've tried other products, but NOTHING that has worked like this including Little Tummies. This is far better. She also likes the taste which makes giving it to her a lot easier. What we really like is given in the correct doses, is produces results without producing diarrhea. If your child needs this you should not hesitate to give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Rivendell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids with GI issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my disabled son who is unable to take pills. I received it in a timely fashion, the packaging is great, comes in a 3 package pre-wrapped. The bottles are very thin, which makes it easy to place in a purchase or backpack if on the go. It comes in root beer flavor and my son has had no problem taking it and said it was tasty. I would recommend this product for anyone that has a child with GI issues.

customer_reviews.title: Works For Kids and Adults, And Tastes Good Too!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best laxative you could take, whether you're a child or an adult, it works for both. The taste is great just as I remember from childhood. Very happy to find this product on Amazon since no one carries it in this area. Two thumbs up!!

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a gentle laxative for adults. I took it based on the Edgar Cayce readings, but my only concern is that while the original version seems to have been made with senna pods, this version is made with senna leaves. I still get a bowel movement, but wish the product had adhered to its original version based off of the Edgar Cayce readings. Also, it seems to have preservatives which I'm not sure if the original did too.

My daughter complained so I immediately took it for myself and it still works HA but that is the only complaint I have and the reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. Just shake it real good!

I would give it 5 stars but there are some ingredients in it I wish they didn't add sucrose, maltodextrin and sodium benzoate. I also don't like how it can't see the ingredients until you buy it.
